name: Reinforced Flappy Bird
description: Training neural networks to play the game Flappy Bird from scratch using Reinforcement Learning with policy gradients in TensorFlow.

name: simplif.ai [YHack 2018]
description: An application to identify overly complex words and phrases. Includes TF recurrent neural net, AutoML-trained neural net, and Wolfram Classify Markov chain.

name: PillUp [HopHacks 2018]
description: Low-cost, IoT enabled medicine dispenser with physician web view, client iOS app, and Google Home client. Johns Hopkins Hackathon Fall 2018 1st place winner.

name: Relief Mesh [HackHarvard 2018]
description: Decentralized mesh network for disaster relief with custom application support. Built with Raspberry Pi Zero, LoRA long-range radios, and Flask.

name: Solanum Time
description: A well-designed pomodoro timer in built with React.js, material-ui, and odometer.js.

name: Climate Sentiment
description: An analysis of sentiment towards climate change based off CNN, Fox News, the Economist, and Reuters, using the Google Cloud Platform NLP toolkit. Visualized in Tableau.

name: Logical Inference
description: An Aristotelian logic system implemented in C. After users make assertions, the system will then solve logical queries using knowledge from previous assertions.

name: FenceMe Fencing Scorekeeper
description: An elegant and easy Android app developed to keep track of fencing matches. Built in Java, Kotlin, RxJava, and Android Studio.
